snippet: Abby Wambach directed the United States past New Zealand, 2-0, in a women’s soccer quarterfinal on Friday.
lead_paragraph: Abby Wambach directed the United States past New Zealand, 2-0, in a women’s soccer quarterfinal on Friday.
